content: change to larger ndls body next round set-up *sl1 p3 repeat from * around pattern work rnds 1 8 of spiral slip_stitch 7 times from chart or repeat written instructions chart key begin crown decreases round 1 decrease *c1/1l k2tog c1/1l k2 repeat from * knit around 98 sts purl round 2 *p1 sl1 p2 sl1 p2 repeat from * around round 3 decrease k1 *c1/1l k1 c1/1l k2tog repeat from * slip 1 until 6 sts rem c1/1l k1 c1/1l slip 1 st onto rh ndl rem m slip_stitch back onto lh ndl k2tog replace m 84 sts c1/1l round 4 p1 *sl1 p2 repeat from * until 2 sts rem sl1 p1 round 5 decrease *k1 c1/2ldec c1/1l repeat from * around 70 sts round 6 *p2tog sl1 p1 sl1 repeat from * around 56 sts round 7 decrease k1 *c1/1l ssk repeat from * until 1 st rem slip 1 st onto rh ndl rem m slip_stitch back onto lh ndl ssk repeat m 42 sts round 8 decrease *p1 ssk repeat from * around 28 sts round 9 decrease k1 *ssk repeat from * until 1 st rem slip 1 st onto rh ndl rem m slip_stitch back onto lh ndl ssk 14 sts round 10 decrease *ssk repeat from * around 7 sts finishing break yarn thread through live stitches 2 3 times and fasten_off weave in remaining ends soak in cool water and wool wash and block to measurements pom pom make a 2 5 cm diameter pompom with remaining yarn secure pom pom to hat and tie off inside useful tips label using sewing thread and a sharp sewing needle sew for a tutorial on working from charts visit kelbourne woolens label to brim as shown kelbournewoolens com/tips and tricks/ working from charts for a tutorial on cabling without a cable needle visit kelbournewoolens com/tips and tricks/ cabling without a cable needle ©2026 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 3 share with us follow us on instagram @kelbournewoolens and show us your projects using the hashtags #kelbournewoolens #yodkhats hat knitting kits kelbourne woolens yarn knitting & crochet patterns
